item.description:
We will head to Magic Wings in Deerfield MA for a great winter getaway. The place will be open to our group for a total of 2 hours to use with tripods and other equipment but at 9 am we have to remove the equipment but we are still welcome to shoot handheld after that

the cost is $15.00 per person which is only $3.00 more than usual price not bad for an extra 2 hours of greAT SHOOTING

HERE IS A LINK TO THEIR SITE

http://www.magicwings...

I will need to know a final count by Jan 31st so as to pay the deposit

They would also like to know if anyone is going to want to eat at the restaurant that does serve breakfast at 8 am and the food court opens later
item.how_to_find_us: we will meet maybe before to car pool if not at entrance
item.name: Winter get away to Magic Wings
